name: Epic Word Search Holiday Special
overview: Epic Word Search puzzles are huge - and they're back in this brand new collection of seasonal puzzles! The Epic Halloween Word Search - There's pumpkins, spiders and blood, but you'll also wear some fabulous costumes while you collect candy! Enter at your own risk! The Epic Christmas Word Search - The biggest gift you'll get this year! Deck the halls, sing some songs and wrap up warm to beat the cold! The Epic Monster Word Search - Prepare for a scare with this monster. Vampires, werewolves and zombies, oh my! You'll never know what's lurking around the corner. Boo! The Epic Love Word Search - Holidays don't stop after December! Everyone loves Valentine's Day, so celebrate it by smooching your way through this extremely huggable puzzle. The Epic Summer Word Search - For our friends down under enjoying a scorching Holiday season, or to distract the rest of us from the cold weather. It's July in Christmas!
